resources.string: Sorry, I can\'t tell what that is.
The image was too dark - find somewhere brighter and try again.
The image was too blurry - hold your phone steadier.
This app needs to use the camera so it can see what is behind the phone. Please grant permission to access the camera otherwise this app cannot work.
This app uses the internet to tell it what the camera is seeing. It therefore needs the internet to work. Please grant it Internet permission in order to work.
We are not able to read out loud what is in front of this device because the utility to do so is not currently available.
Please check that you are connected to the internet.
Permission to vibrate the device is required to give feedback to blind and deaf users that the picture was taken and is being analysed.
